info.title: Azure Database Migration Service Resource Provider

MigrateMySqlAzureDbForMySqlReplicateChan.description: Input for the task that migrates MySQL databases to Azure Database for MySQL for the replicate changes migrations

targetConnectionInfo.description: Connection information for target Azure Database for MySQL

startedOn.description: Parameter to specify when the migration started

sourceServerResourceId.description: Optional resource Id of the source server if it is an azure instance

targetServerResourceId.description: Optional resource Id of the target server

optionalAgentSettings.description: Optional parameters for fine tuning the data migration

binLogInfo.description: The binlog position to start replicating the changes at

MigrateMySqlAzureDbForMySqlReplicateChan.description: Database specific information for MySQL to Azure Database for MySQL migration task inputs

tableMap.description: Mapping of source to target tables

MigrateMySqlAzureDbForMySqlReplicateChan.description: Output for the task that migrates MySQL databases to Azure Database for MySQL for the replicate changes migrations

lastStorageUpdate.description: Last time the migration status storage was updated

hasServerLevelError.description: Indicates that the migration has server level error

totalRetryingTime.description: Total amount of time during the migration where operations were impacted by transient errors

totalSourceRetryCount.description: Total number of retries that have occurred due to transient errors raised by the source server

totalTargetRetryCount.description: Total number of retries that have occurred due to transient errors raised by the target server

totalOtherRetryCount.description: Total number of retries that have occurred due to transient errors raised by the unknown source

binlogPosition.description: Current binlog position of the last event committed at target

timestamp.description: The timestamp exposed by the last binlog event that has been committed at target

numberOfRowsInserted.description: The total number of rows inserted at target

numberOfRowsUpdated.description: The total number of rows updated at target

numberOfRowsDeleted.description: The total number of rows deleted at target

numberOfQueryEventsProcessed.description: The total number of query events executed at target, such as DDL, or DML when using mixed binlog mode

numberOfWriteRowsEventsProcessed.description: The the total number of the WRITE_ROWS_EVENTs processed

numberOfUpdateRowsEventsProcessed.description: The the total number of the UPDATE_ROWS_EVENTs processed

numberOfDeleteRowsEventsProcessed.description: The total number of the DELETE_ROWS_EVENTs processed

secondsBehindSource.description: The number of seconds the target server is behind the source server
